headline: Ohio Senate race heats up
author: Brandy Johanntges
sentences: Chagrin Falls State Senator Matt Dolan with just about 10%, and former Ohio Republican Party Chairperson Jane Timken just under 10%.
(WKBN)- A new poll is out in Ohioâ€™s Republican race for the U.S. Senate, and at this point, Josh Mandel is in the lead.
The poll was conducted by the Trafalgar Group between February 8 and 10.
Twenty-one percent of those polled liked Josh Mandel.
Cleveland banker Mike Gibbons was second with 16%.
